dmca.title: FW: [EV1-C1987957A] DMCA copyright complaint
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: IBCIM.ORG - Customer Service [mailto:service@ibcim.org] 
Sent: Saturday, December 02, 2006 6:38 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Re: FW: [EV1-C1987957A] DMCA copyright complaint

Dear Sirs,

I have now attached the document and thank you for letting me know.

Kind Regards

Christian H. Nilsson



> ----------------------------------------
> From: Copyright <Copyright@theplanet.com>
> Sent: Fri Dec 01 19:49:01 CET 2006
> To: <service@ibcim.org>
> Subject: FW: [EV1-C1987957A] DMCA copyright complaint
> 
> 
>  To Whom It May Concern:
> 
> Please re-send the below-pasted complaint since there is not an 
> attachment to this e-mail. Sorry for the inconvenience.
> 
> Legal Response Team
> 
> -----Original Message-----
> From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Wednesday, 
> November 29, 2006 10:39 PM Posted To: DMCA
> Conversation: [EV1-C1987957A] DMCA copyright complaint
> Subject: [EV1-C1987957A] DMCA copyright complaint
> 
> 
> From: abuse@theplanet.com
> Subject: [EV1-C1987957A] DMCA copyright complaint
> Reference: [EV1-C1987957A]
> 
> For your review. 
> 
> --
> Regards,
> Abuse Department
> The Planet - EV1Servers
> http://theplanet.com/legal/index.html
> http://ev1servers.net/About/aup.aspx
> http://ev1servers.net/About/tos.aspx
> 
> ==== Original Message ====
> 1. DMCA copyright complaint
> Added by system at Thursday, Nov 30 2006 04:30 am
> X-MailFrom: service@ibcim.org
> X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net
> Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for 
> <abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Thu Nov 30 04:30:12 2006
> Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by 
> smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830);
>   Thu, 30 Nov 2006 04:29:46 -0600
> Return-path: <service@ibcim.org>
> Delivery-date: Thu, 30 Nov 2006 04:29:47 -0600
> Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180]
> helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) 
>         by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from service@ibcim.org) 
>         with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) 
>         (Exim) 
>         id 1GpjAo-0001hk-Ka 
>         for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 30 Nov 2006 04:29:47 -0600
> Received: from cinderella.contactoffice.net ([212.3.242.69]
> helo=wilbur.contactoffice.net) 
>         by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from service@ibcim.org) 
>         with esmtp (Exim) 
>         id 1GpjAl-000Oru-5N 
>         for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 30 Nov 2006 04:29:44 -0600
> Received: from dumbo (dumbo.co-bxl [10.0.0.2]) 
>         by wilbur.contactoffice.net (Postfix) with ESMTP id 772911237F6;
> 
>         Thu, 30 Nov 2006 11:29:35 +0100 (CET)
> Message-ID: <27547568.1164882574823.JavaMail.root@dumbo>
> From: " IBCIM.ORG - Customer Service" <service@ibcim.org>
> Reply-To: " IBCIM.ORG - Customer Service" <service@ibcim.org>
> Subject: DMCA copyright complaint
> MIME-Version: 1.0
> Content-Type: multipart/mixed;  
>         boundary="----=_Part_5105_1129955.1164882321105" 
> X-Priority: 3
> To: abuse@theplanet.com
> Date: Thu, 30 Nov 2006 11:29:34 +0100 (CET)
> X-Origin-IP: 222.152.235.143
> X-Mailer: ContactOffice Mail
> X-OriginalArrivalTime: 30 Nov 2006 10:29:46.0842 (UTC) 
> FILETIME=[752E83A0:01C7146A]
> 
>  (multipart/mixed)
>  (multipart/alternative)
> MIME element (text/plain)
> Dear Sirs,
>  
> I had previously sent you the attached DMCA copyright infringement 
> complaint but did not receive a response.
>  
> I would very much appreciate if you could take a second look. Under 
> international law websites that are infringing on copyrights must be 
> shut down by the respective host.
>  
> The site in question is: www.axn-international.com
>  
> This site is using my Seal of Approval (Merchant Certified) to make 
> them appear legitimate.
>  
> This website is actually a scam where they accept cash through Western

> Union and send no merchandise.
>  
> The seal was originally linked to a complete COPY of my own company 
> website but I have successfully shut them down.
>  
> Once again I appreciate your help in this matter and I assume you do 
> not want to be associated with this type of activities.
>  
> Sincereley,
>  
> Christian H. Nilsson
>  
> -------------------------------------------------------------------
dmca.principal_name: The International Bureau of Certified Internet Merchants
